attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: This app is so confusing it is not even workable I thought I could just do what I wanted to do it would be easy but no it was so hard to understand and I deleted it right away!!!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and slow down. Once I had started using this app I realize that my battery would drain faster than before

attributes.title: no thanks❤️
attributes.review: this app is racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, disableist and more. with this being said i DO NOT recommend unless you are a straight cis white male. glitchy and not great for real info. the motto is facts over feelings right so let's uphold that ideal and start using it. not a good app. #biden2020

attributes.title: Don’t do it
attributes.review: Literally the worst app I’ve ever downloaded when I put in my information they stole my credit cards and have taken $2000 out of my account and I now have a SWAT team outside of my house way to go trump 🖕🏽

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible. I wouldn’t recommend getting it. It has so many viruses that I thought my phone would get hacked. Overall this app is very worthless and it isn’t good for anything.

attributes.title: It’s trash
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app I got harassed by Donald trump himself. He said vote or I’ll build a wall in front of ur house. I obviously didn’t like that. So I tried to run away. That didn’t work he got in his jet and ran me over. I now can not run.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app tried to take away my right to vote, my access to birth control, my health insurance, and it tried to monitor my sexual activity. Stay as far away from this app and the trump family as possible.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is horrible, it took weeks to download, it was very slow and most things were lagging, even though my WiFi is perfectly fine

attributes.title: 10/10 would 🧚🏼‍♂️✨NOT✨🧚🏼‍♂️ recommend
attributes.review: Wasn’t really feeling positive vibes but I downloaded anyway, trying to keep an open mind you know? But that was a mistake, I wish I could go back to a time before I saw what I saw 🙅🏽‍♀️🙅🏽‍♀️🙅🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I opened the app and automatically I heard Donald trump call me the n word and said I was a waste of time. Donald trump always saying he’ll make America better but This few years him being president has gone worse
